Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.board

Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.board.Island
public class Island extends Object
The Island entity is used to simulate one of the island present in the game board where player can position students to grow influences and conquer them
